CREATE TABLE T_ACTIVITY ( published boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false, duration int4range NULL, age int4range NULL, participants int4range NULL, difficulty integer NULL, rating integer NULL, participant_goal text NULL, playground_description text NULL, rules text NULL, "id" uuid NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PK__ACTIVITY PRIMARY KEY ("id"), CONSTRAINT FK__ARTIFACT__ACTIVITY FOREIGN KEY ("id") REFERENCES T_ARTIFACT ("id"), CONSTRAINT CHK__ACTIVITY__DIFFICULTY CHECK ( difficulty >= 0 AND difficulty <= 5 ), CONSTRAINT CHK__ACTIVITY__RATING CHECK ( rating >= 0 AND rating <= 5 ) );
CREATE INDEX IDX__ACTIVITY__ID ON T_ACTIVITY ( "id" );
